contentrichtext.text: '''Willy Matheisl''' (born 1950) is a photographer living in [[Deggendorf]], [[Bavaria]], [[Germany]]. He is the creator of a famous photo of a [[tree]] through the [[Season|four seasons]]. The image has been used on calendars, on book covers and school books. ==External links== *[http://www.matheisl.homepage.t-online.de/ famous composing of the tree image] *[http://www.gettyimages.de/Search/Search.aspx?assettype=image&artist=Matheisl# Getty Images has more views of this tree, photographed by Willy Matheisl] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Matheisl, Willy | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1950 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Matheisl, Willy}} [[Category:1950 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:German photographers]] {{Germany-photographer-stub}}
